response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your business. Given its high value and the significant impact it can have on your operations, I propose a special introductory price of $12,500 for you. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a savings of $2,500 compared to the standard price. Please let me know if this aligns with your budget and strategic goals. I look forward to potentially partnering with you on this valuable endeavor.", "product_price": 12500}
